column5: Simple, clean and convenient! Good vibes throughout the home. Perfect for couples, solo adventurers and business travelers. Only 6 miles to North Padre Island, 10 miles to downtown Corpus Christi, 14 miles to CRP airport, 1.4 miles to NAS CC South Gate, 0.3 miles to S.P.I.D. Hwy 358 for an easy commute. Walking distance to Walmart, Subway, tacos, seafood & chicken fried steak.
